com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.database

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.w19t06.theundesirablejackals.database.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Database Helper is a class meant to abstract away the details of the database. Instead of making all calls within the activity or class the app will use callbacks provided in the database package in order to collect data once it is available, or to check the status of a database call

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseHelper()
      Constructor for database helper, sets up all the database references that could be needed

    • Method Detail

      • registerUser

        public void registerUser(User user,
                         BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database to register and save (asynchronously) the currentUser's custom User object
        Parameters:
        user - The currentuser's custom User object that is to be written in the database
        booleanCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data write used to pass completion status back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • isRegistered

        public void isRegistered(BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Check if the current user (getCurrentUser) is registered in the database as a full user object
        Parameters:
        booleanCallback - the callback that will be used to signal that the asynchronous database search has been completed

      • isUsernameAvailable

        public void isUsernameAvailable(java.lang.String username,
                                BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Parameters:
        username - to be checked against registered usernames for uniqueness
        booleanCallback - the function which will be called once the result is available Since database access is asynchronous, the result will not be available right away. Instead, once the result comes back it can be dealt with using various Callback interfaces

      • getUserInfoFromDatabase

        public void getUserInfoFromDatabase(java.lang.String username,
                                    UserInformationCallback userInformationCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database and fetches (asynchronously) the currentUser custom UserInformation object
        Parameters:
        username - The username to use when searching for specific user info
        userInformationCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data acquisition used to pass data back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • getAllBookInformations

        public void getAllBookInformations(Book book,
                                   BookInformationListCallback bookInformationListCallback)
        goes into the database and searches for all instances of book information which are related to the book that was passed in (by isbn)
        Parameters:
        book - The book for which the user specific information objects are requested
        bookInformationListCallback - Callback used to pass the complete data set back to the calling function

      • updateBookInformation

        public void updateBookInformation(@NonNull
                                  BookInformation bookInformation,
                                  BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        go to the database and update this instance of book Information
        Parameters:
        bookInformation - the book information which has been updated and needs to be written back to the database
        booleanCallback - A boolean callback which says whether the write was successful

      • getBookInformation

        public void getBookInformation(java.lang.String bookInformationKey,
                               BookInformationCallback bookInformationCallback)
        Get one specific instance of BookInformation from the database using it's database key lookup
        Parameters:
        bookInformationKey - The database key for looking up ONE SPECIFIC book information object
        bookInformationCallback - The callback which will pass back the book information object

      • getBooksAfterIsbn

        public void getBooksAfterIsbn(java.lang.String isbn,
                              java.lang.Integer quantity,
                              BookListCallback bookListCallback)
        This function will go to the database and will grab a number of books less than or equal to @param quantity, the function will sort all the books available in the database and will start fetching the books that occur AFTER @param isbn
        Parameters:
        isbn - The isbn that needs to appear at the start of the list of books
        quantity - The MAXIMUM number of books to fetch from the database
        bookListCallback - The callback used to pass data back to the calling function/class

      • getBooksBeforeIsbn

        public void getBooksBeforeIsbn(java.lang.String isbn,
                               java.lang.Integer quantity,
                               BookListCallback bookListCallback)
        This function will go to the database and will grab a number of books less than or equal to @param quantity, the function will sort all the books available in the database and will fetch a quantity of books that occur BEFORE @param isbn
        Parameters:
        isbn - The isbn that needs to appear at the end of the list of books
        quantity - The MAXIMUM number of books to fetch from the database
        bookListCallback - The callback used to pass data back to the calling function/class

      • getBookFromDatabase

        public void getBookFromDatabase(java.lang.String isbn,
                                BookCallback bookCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database and fetches (asynchronously) the Book coresponding to isbn
        Parameters:
        isbn - the string representing a valid book ISBN that google books api can use/search
        bookCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data acquisition

                              BooleanCallback booleanCallback)

        Parameters:

        booleanCallback - A callback used to tell the status of the book write

                                   UserInformation userInformation,
                                   BooleanCallback onCallback)
        The database helper for downloading a profile picture
        Parameters:
        file - the pre-allocated file for storing the user's profile picture.
        userInformation - The user who's profile picture we will be fetching
        onCallback - The callback so the fetch status is known, and completion can be tracked

      • uploadProfilePicture

        public void uploadProfilePicture(android.net.Uri file,
                                 UserInformation userInformation,
                                 BooleanCallback onCallback)
        Upload a user profile picture for use only by the current user
        Parameters:
        file - The file location of the file to be uploaded
        userInformation - The user who is uploading their profile picture
        onCallback - The call back which tells when the process is done and if it succeeded or not

                            BookRequestListCallback bookRequestListCallback)
        Gets the user's Lend requests (user from userInformation)
        Parameters:
        userName - The user who's lend requests we are fetching
        bookRequestListCallback - A callback so the fetch status is known, completion can be tracked, and the data retrieved

      • makeBorrowRequest

        public void makeBorrowRequest(BookRequest bookRequest,
                              BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Sends a borrow request to the owner of the book To be used by BORROWER ONLY
        Parameters:
        bookRequest - The book request that is being made by Borrower to Owner
        booleanCallback - A callback so the request status is known, and completion can be tracked

      • updateLendRequest

        public void updateLendRequest(BookRequest bookRequest,
                              BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Updates the borrower request list with new status in the book request To be used by OWNER ONLY
        Parameters:
        bookRequest - The book request that is being updated by Owner for Borrower
        booleanCallback - A callback so the request status is known, and completion can be tracked

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Messaging message,
                        BooleanCallback booleanCallback)
        Creates a message in the database between two users. It will be written two times, one for each user (sender and receiver)
        Parameters:
        message - the message which needs to be written to the database
        booleanCallback - A callback used to tell the status of the database write

      • getMessages

        public void getMessages(java.lang.String username,
                        MessageListCallback messageListCallback)
        Gets a non-discriminatory list of messages which were sent by or received by @param username This means that EVERY message will be retrieved in chronological order. It is up to the calling function to parse through the messages and decide which conversation they belong to.
        Parameters:
        username - The user who's messages we need to retrieve
        messageListCallback - the list of messages this user has sent and received
